properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 8 at 1:04AM MST until February 8 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 3
to 6 inches at most lower elevations and 6 to 12 inches in the
mountains and over Kings Hill Pass. Winds gusting as high as 40
mph.

* WHERE...Cascade and Judith Basin Counties.

* WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially between the
hours of 2 PM and 8 PM. Areas of blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of time with the worst travel
conditions is expected between 2 PM and 8 PM, generally from
Great Falls to Lewistown and Great Falls to Kings Hill Pass.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING
